name: Flying Fish Quest
summary: Dolly, the little fish and Tim, her sea-horse friend live in a beautiful undersea world. Dolly is a flying fish and likes to fly out of the water to enjoy the warmth of the sun. One day, it suddenly grows darker right in the middle of the day! As the darkness sets in, Dolly and Tim become more and more concerned. Help them on their journey to save their beloved lagoon and overcome many puzzles and obstacles along the way!
